name: Dungeon Feed | Ludum Dare 46
description:
[LUDUM DARE 46 SUBMISSION]

In this fast paced burger cooking game you must make hamburgers for the big scary monster before it's too late! Even while under attack by his minions.

THERE'S A TUTORIAL IN THE GAME (NOT THE BEST) BUT HERE'S AN EXTRA INCASE YOU'RE TOO LAZY OR ITS TOO DIFFICULT TO READ:

- Head over to the stove (Labeled in the tutorial)

- Press Z and play the minigame (Press the keys that show up)

- Once you see a flying burger, head over to the plate table (Labeled in the tutorial)

- Press Z on the plate table and head over to the burger and press Z

- Once both the burger and plate is on top of u, get close to the monster and press [ARROW UP].

- DON'T LET THE BAR ABOVE HIM DROP DOWN (trust me)

CONTROLS:

[Z] - Interact

[X] - Shoot

[UP ARROW] - Feed

[LEFT RIGHT ARROW KEY] - Move
